Identity.Name: Inferno Mage Isidorus
Identity.Basic_Description: wizard cloacked in dark gray with red trim and a brown walking staff with red gemstone in the top

Abilities.Name: Immolate
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, choose a target in line of site within 10 range of Isidorus. Roll 3 d20s. On each roll of a 10 or less, deal 1 damage to the target.

Abilities.Name: Hot Spot
Abilities.Ability: Choose a unit within 10 range of Isidorus. That unit must move a distance greater than or equal to it's sprint value on it's next turn. (Put a fortune token on that unit to mark it as having to move)
